card.note: Happiest of birthdays to you, Mom. All our (ABSOLUTE, ENDLESS, UNDYING, EVERLASTING and PERFECT) love
card.author: Patrick, Conor and Tara

card.note: You are an AMAZING woman, mother, grandmother and friend who deserves a celebration with all those that love you so dearly. Wishing you the very best birthday and we will be dancing with you in spirit!
card.author: Tamara, Andrew, Presley and Aaron

card.note: Have a wonderful birthday day and celebrate it all year long. You deserve it. Love,
card.author: Bill and Kara Mohan

card.note: Baseball, Concert Hall, Outback and our Paddy over Ice – great times
card.author: Tim

card.note: Dear Mazer, I definitely did something right to have landed you or you did something really wrong!! I love you more than words can grasp – Looking forward to our next adventure with a splash of Margaritas ... Happy Happy Birthday My super amazing friend. All my love,
card.author: Sinead

card.note: Someone ask me if I knew you. I laughed and said Ha! That's funny!! I adore that woman!! She's blessed, caring, loving, sweet, beautiful and a woman of spirit. She's the kind of woman that when her feet hit the floor each morning the devil says: Oh shit, she up!
card.author: Love, Jane

card.note: Misses D, Happy 75th Birthday. What a woman!
card.author: Rory Quirke

card.note: Happy birthday, Ann, so blessed that Michael came to live with the Devlin's so we Donohues got to know and love you all. Have a wonderful day. Love to all,
card.author: Lennie Donohue

card.note: Late at night or early in the morning.. she will always be there for you. A true inspiration for any parent. One in a million! Love you!
card.author: Andrew

card.note: Behind every great band is an even greater mother. Happy birthday!
card.author: Mike McAloon

card.note: Can't think of a nicer, more spirited and fun person to wish a Happy Birthday. Enjoy your special day. Love,
card.author: June and Bill

card.note: You are such a wonderful woman to spend time with, full of such great stories and warmth and wisdom. I treasure my time with you and always come away inspired.
card.author: Gillian Walsh/Plockelman

card.note: What a fabulous lady you are. I thoroughly enjoy our get togethers (though we need to up the anti and definitely try and get a Christmas lunch in this year!).
card.author: Gillian Walsh/Plockelman

card.note: Enjoy all the love and attention. You are truly worthy of it. Happy Birthday! Love,
card.author: Your sister Mary

card.note: I was remembering all the fun we had with your family in Midland, especially the player piano!
card.author: Dorothy Huber

card.note: Ann is the only person I know who could get me to an airplane museum. She has a wonderful curiosity.
card.author: Sherri Moran

card.note: Congratulations Ann we'll make the 100 yet !! You set the example we'll follow!! Love
card.author: Ann Smyth

card.note: Congratulations Ann keep going we're right behind you taking our cue from you! God Bless
card.author: Ann Eoin

card.note: Happy Birthday to the BEST OLDEST sister anyone could have. I am glad you are mine!!
card.author: Rita

card.note: I love Ann Devlin because she is in one word, fabulous! How does she do it? I will never know, but she always remembers everything about you, even what the last conversation was about!
card.author: Rebeca Salazar

card.note: The great sages say that you have to bring at least six people to God in each lifetime. Looks like you have done it 13 times. You have always done more than your share, always given 100%, always tried your best and gave us the best life ever.
card.author: Mari

card.note: I want you to know that your great and sweet influence is always with me. I think of your Godly example each day and follow your good ways. You have been a wonderful example of mother and womanhood to me.
card.author: Mari

card.note: Wishing you a very happy 75th birthday! We were so touched to get your card and gift for little Evie, you have always been so thoughtful. We will be back at Christmas, so fingers crossed we’ll get to wish you a happy birthday in person! Lots of love,
card.author: Colin, Sonya and Evie

card.note: Happy Birthday, Auntie Ann!! Wishing you 75 tickets in the drawer. Hope you have a great party.
card.author: Lisa

card.note: You have been a constant source of joy, strength and love through all the ups and downs life has thrown at our family. Thank you for being a wonderful Mum! Love always,
card.author: Brid

card.note: From my earliest memories, you captured my admiration. I so appreciate your humor, your faith and realism, and belief in the best of people. Time with you is precious. Love you,
card.author: Jeanine McGowan

card.note: The first time we met was at the Fianna Fáil Cummahn in the Killiney Court many years ago. Fe Redmond was holding forth at the time. We had some great social occasions in your house on the beach. You were always so welcoming.
card.author: Louis and Fionnuala

card.note: I remember your parents coming to our house for afternoon tea one day. And I think your sister was with them. I remember bringing my mother to your home in Killiney and then in Glengeary. She thought the world of you!
card.author: Louis and Fionnuala

card.note: We have reached our golden years and eventhough we don't see very much of each other, we have the warmth of our memories and knowledge, that we can take up from where we left off the last time we met!
card.author: Louis and Fionnuala

card.note: Best. Grandma. Ever!! Love,
card.author: Nina, Griffin and Lucie

card.note: Wishing you much love, happiness, laughter and friendship as you celebrate your 75th Birthday. Bill and I send you much love and many hugs (especially me). Look forward to having time to catch up when you visit next. May your heart be joyful. Love,
card.author: Jan Deegan

card.note: What a lady! I love your regular visits to Donaghmore. Auntie Ann, you are a great conversationalist, and so interesting with lots of stories to tell. I love to hear about the family and about your travels.
card.author: Julie Deery

card.note: You were always a great family person, able to handle the gang with such ease, although I do remember u threatening to put Patrick out of the minibus in the middle of Dublin City!
card.author: Julie Deery

card.note: I recollect great times at your house, u had no bother adding us to the gang, and we loved every minute! Thank you.
card.author: Julie Deery

card.note: Big happy birthday to Mrs D. Where does the time go, 50 already ha! Hope you have a great day
card.author: Barry

card.note: I love that you have a big red car grandma
card.author: Cillian

card.note: I love giving hugs to you
card.author: Caoimhe

card.note: Happy Birthday Ann, hope you have a great night with family & friends. All my love,
card.author: Carol

card.note: Wishing a wonderful mother, mother in law and grandma a fantastic 75th birthday. Love
card.author: C, J, C, C & T

card.note: To my wonderful mother in law, your positivity, faith and outlook on life inspires me as a woman and mother. Thank you. Love,
card.author: Jennifer

card.note: You are inspiration of what we women are capable of; strong, educated & loving with great inner beauty.
card.author: Suzanne O'Connell
